# Lila Chibane — Health & Fitness Coach

> Health and fitness coach specializing in personalized support for active women looking to resume a regular, enjoyable and adapted physical activity.

## Identity

- Name: Lila Chibane
- Profession: Health & fitness coach
- Website: https://lilachibane.com
- Contact: lila.chibane@outlook.com
- Language: French

## Location

- Online sessions (video): all of France
- In-person sessions: Médoc area (Gironde, Nouvelle-Aquitaine, France)

## Target audience

- Active women, ages 30–55
- Returning to exercise after a long break
- Chronic fatigue, stress, mental overload
- Physical pain or limitations
- Looking for a supportive, pressure-free coaching approach

## Approach

Lila offers individual coaching built on three pillars:

1. **Adapted physical activity**: strength training, mobility, exercises tailored to each woman's level and constraints.
2. **Nervous system regulation**: stress management, breathing techniques, body awareness. Effort is adjusted based on the state of the nervous system.
3. **Supportive nutrition**: nutritional guidance to sustain energy and recovery, with no dieting or restriction.

## Format

- Individual coaching via video or in-person (Médoc)
- Fully personalized program
- Sessions scheduled around the client's availability
- Free 30-minute discovery call

## Values

- No pressure, no punishment, at your own pace
- Pleasure over performance
- Consistency over intensity
- Kindness, zero guilt

## Site pages

- https://lilachibane.com — Home page (philosophy, method, about, contact)
- https://lilachibane.com/blog — Blog with health, fitness and wellness tips
- https://lilachibane.com/quiz — Energy quiz to discover your profile and get personalized advice
